### Figure 28.4

plot_Fig28_4
plot_Fig28_4_IBM


no defaults

```{r}
F28.4 <- param_ranges(figure = 28.4)
F28.4.seq <- param_seqs(F28.4)
F28.4.grid <- param_grid(param.seqs = F28.4.seq)
F28.4.FAC <- runFAC_multi(param.grid = F28.4.grid,
                          verbose = F)

```

```{r}
plot_Fig28_4(runFAC.multi = F28.4.FAC,
             plot.debug.lines = F)
```
